description:
Join our community of +1000 enthusiastic students!

Click enroll now!

If you can't afford the price of the course,

there is a discount coupon for you :)

Send me a message to tell you the coupon code.

We shouldn't put boarders for learners. :)

- More than 23 lectures of about 60 minutes in total.

- This course is a condensed overview of PowerPoint. You will gain most of the important information about how to make a PowerPoint presentation. you will find a step-by-step explanation of the common tools such as slide views, text box, picture, tables, charts, objects, and others.

- Actually, I like to get to the point directly during teaching in order no to disturb my students. So, I designed each lecture to be less than 2 minutes long. This will help you to progress fast and not to feel bored.

- We will learn together all the tools you need to create PowerPoint slides that are ready to be presented.

Join us on our Facebook group to have some discussions and all the new announcements and

Search for "online courses community"

Follow us on our Facebook page to know our new courses

Search for "online courses community"
title: Your First Step of Mastering PowerPoint. Easy & to the point
